{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ativa |model=AWGR54 |revision= |upc=735854242220 |ean= |asin=B000PELWY4 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/28/2006 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG4005G |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=RAXWG4005G |ic_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2317 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=25P16V6P |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16400B-TTL |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2317 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=schematic |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Ativa54g |default_ssid_regex=^Ativa54g$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:17:3F |oui_eth=00:17:3F |default_ch= }} [http://www.ativaproducts.com/support_networking.html Ativa Networking devices support page]
[http://www.ativaproducts.com/downloads/195-914_P75234_AWGR54_man_hi-res.pdf Manual] OEM Arcadyan WG4005G According to the FCC test report, the same hardware is used by the following devices.. *Belkin F5D7230-4 *USRobotics USR5463, USR805463, USR015463 *SMC SMCWBR14-G2 "141400520017J", "REV: 01" may be silkscreened on the board. [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=29412&highlight=raxwg4005g On the DD-WRT forums] (images)
